movie.title: Blade Runner
movie.description: A blade runner must pursue and terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space, and have returned to Earth to find their creator.

movie.title: Alien
movie.description: After a space merchant vessel perceives an unknown transmission as a distress call, its landing on the source moon finds one of the crew attacked by a mysterious lifeform, and they soon realize that its life cycle has merely begun.

movie.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
movie.description: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

movie.title: The Big Lebowski
movie.description: "The Dude" Lebowski, mistaken for a millionaire Lebowski, seeks restitution for his ruined rug and enlists his bowling buddies to help get it.

movie.title: Lawrence of Arabia
movie.description: The story of T.E. Lawrence, the English officer who successfully united and led the diverse, often warring, Arab tribes during World War I in order to fight the Turks.

movie.title: The Thing
movie.description: A research team in Antarctica is hunted by a shape-shifting alien that assumes the appearance of its victims.

movie.title: Get Out
movie.description: A black man goes to visit his white girlfriend's parents in the country and things get weird.
